The symbol of the award is a small bronze statue of Arjuna with his bow.Arjuna is an Indian literary figure who is known for his skill in archery. ==International competitions== The Indian government confers Arjuna Award on selected athletes who take part in Olympic Games, Asian Games, Commonwealth Games, World Cup Championships and sports for the physically challenged.YAS, "Scheme For The Arjuna Awards For Outstanding Performance In Sports And Games"; retrieved 2012-7-20. ==References== ==Other websites== * List of Arjuna Awardees Category:Sport in India Category:1961 establishments in Asia Category:Sports trophies and awards Category:1960s establishments in India
